meanings.definition: A bag with shoulder straps that allow it to be carried on one's back.
meanings.sent1: I packed my snacks and water bottle in my rucksack for the hike.
meanings.sent2: She slung her rucksack over her shoulders before heading to school.
meanings.sent3: The rucksack looked like a turtle shell on his back.
meanings.sent4: Her rucksack was a trusty companion on all her adventures.
meanings.sent5: The bright red rucksack stood out against the green forest.

meanings.definition: To carry or transport in a rucksack.
meanings.sent1: I rucksacked all my camping gear for the trip.
meanings.sent2: They rucksack their belongings when they go hiking.
meanings.sent3: He rucksacked his books to the library for the book drive.
meanings.sent4: She rucksacks her tools to the construction site every morning.
meanings.sent5: Rucksacking supplies made the journey much easier.
